TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 1<sup>st</sup> Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: Those that have sinned beyond measure, do Thou abundantly forgive, O Savior, and vouchsafe us without condemnation to worship Thy holy Resurrection, through the intercessions of Thy most pure Mother, O Thou Who alone art plenteous in mercy.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: For with the Lord there is mercy,
and with Him is plenteous redemption.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Out of the depths have I cried unto Thee, O Lord; O Lord, hear my voice.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Let Israel hope in the Lord,
SEXTE.STICHOS: O Lord, my heart is not exalted, nor are mine eyes become lofty.
